Begin Row: K1, K1 and leave stitch on needle, knit into the head of the stitch below the one just knitted, and slip both stitches off needle together; k2 *
Repeat: k2 tog-b, put the resulting stitch back on the left-hand needle and pass the next stitch over it and off the needle; then return the stitch to the right-hand needle; k2, knit into the head of the stitch below the next stitch, then knit the next stitch through the back loop, then knit again into the head of same stitch below (the 'same' stitch is now the 3rd stitch down); k2
End Row: k2 tog-b and pass the next stitch over, k2, knit into the stitch below next stitch, then knit the next stitch itself
